hero.title: Learn English the Easy Way
hero.subtitle: Join our community of 385,000+ Spanish speakers learning English through engaging, practical, and fun content.

daily_life.title: Daily Life English
daily_life.description: Learn the most useful sentences and expressions that Spanish speakers need in everyday situations.

movie_vocab.title: Movie Vocabulary
movie_vocab.description: Understand your favorite movies and series by learning common expressions and slang used in entertainment.

pronunciation.title: Perfect Pronunciation
pronunciation.description: Master the sounds that are most challenging for Spanish speakers with our targeted practice exercises.

vocabulary.title: ¿Cuántas Palabras Conoces?
vocabulary.description: Test your knowledge with our popular word recognition challenges. How many English words can you remember?

movies.title: Frases de Películas Famosas
movies.description: Learn iconic movie quotes in English and impress your friends with your cultural knowledge and perfect pronunciation.

pronunciation.title: Pronunciación Perfecta
pronunciation.description: Master the most challenging English sounds for Spanish speakers with our targeted pronunciation exercises.

quiz.title: Test Your Movie Quote Knowledge
quiz.intro: How well do you know famous movie quotes in English? Take this quick quiz to test your knowledge!
quiz.question: Question
quiz.perfect_score: ¡Perfecto! You're a movie quote master! Your English and movie knowledge are impressive!
quiz.good_score: ¡Muy bien! You know your movies and English quotes quite well!
quiz.average_score: ¡Buen intento! Keep watching movies in English to improve your knowledge!
quiz.low_score: ¡Sigue practicando! Watch more movies in English with subtitles to learn these famous quotes!

travel_guide.title: Travel English Guide
travel_guide.description: Essential phrases and vocabulary for Spanish speakers traveling to English-speaking countries.

movie_collection.title: Movie English Collection
movie_collection.description: Learn 100+ expressions from popular movies and TV shows with context and examples.

pronunciation_workbook.title: Pronunciation Workbook
pronunciation_workbook.description: Targeted exercises for Spanish speakers to master challenging English sounds.

footer.about_text: Helping Spanish speakers learn English through engaging, practical, and fun content since 2020.
